name: Aromatic Mist
description: You release an aroma that inspires your allies. When you activate this move, you and any ally within 5 feet of you may add a d4 to any saving throw they make for the duration.
higherLevels: The bonus dice roll for this move changes to a 1d6 at level 10

effect.name: Gets the Pok√©mon pumped up. Helps prevent nervousness, too.
effect.effect: Doubles the Appeal Points of a successful move in the next round. Pokemon also has advantage on CHA Saving Throws until after their move next round is performed.
